subject: For Bruce  Re: [EVP-ITC] ok here we are I posted a bunch of new RS470 files to esnips
author: Ron Lederer
full_text:
--0-390184467-1201925440=:74879
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Went into your files again on esnips.  Works fine. All files listed in order with numbers much like yahoo group files...clicked on one file...wainted a bit and the session was played...didn't have to do anything else until I wanted to replay.  I still like it.  Still can't get into Ann's files...nothing personal.  Smile  Ron L

Lisby <lisby@...> wrote:
          When I click on your link it goes to page with your picture (nice to see your face, finally! :) ) and underneath a section called "Files". All of your files are listed with an icon that looks like a square with a microphone and a CD. It is the only clickable thing--I can't click the title of the clip, for example. When I click it, nothing ever happens. I looks like it is loading but nothing comes of it.  

  I've had this problem with esnips since it first started up. I have never yet been able to get any clip of any length by anyone to ever load.
  

  Ann
  
    On Feb 1, 2008, at 2:33 PM, bruce halliday wrote:

          Ann,
 
Which icon are you talking about?
 
bruce



  Bruce Halliday 




    
---------------------------------
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
From: lisby@...
Date: Fri, 1 Feb 2008 13:07:46 -0500
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] ok here we are I posted a bunch of new RS470 files to esnips

      Okay, Bruce, the job of the day is figure out why I get nothing when I click on the icon. I can't.  

  Ann
  Very sad
  

  
    On Feb 1, 2008, at 12:47 PM, bruce halliday wrote:

          Ahhh Robin,
 
A breath of fresh air!
 
Yes all the files are recent, and yes your ear is gettting better.
But the quality of the files will vary according to the conditions at the time of the session.
 
bruce




  Bruce Halliday 




    
---------------------------------
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
From: MudPuddleFarm@...
Date: Thu, 31 Jan 2008 22:19:31 -0800
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] ok here we are I posted a bunch of new RS470 files to esnips

          I think it works great.  Are these all recent?  Either your recordings are getting better by the moment or my hearing is improving, because they sound amazingly clear to me.
   
  Robin
   
   
    ----- Original Message -----
  From: bhali333
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Thursday, January 31, 2008 4:26 PM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] ok here we are I posted a bunch of new RS470 files to esnips
  

  Hey guy's 

I just posted a bunch of RS 470 files to esnips here's the link if you 
would like to give a listen.

http://www.esnips.com/web/RSBoxFiles

Let me know what you think.

Bruce
